m_szDocTitle: City of Oakland Hosts Alternative Car Expo on May 28 - Oil & Gas 360
m_szDocSumamry: City of Oakland Hosts Alternative Car Expo on May 28  May 20, 2015 - 9:30 AM EDT close yes               City of Oakland Hosts Alternative Car Expo on May 28 OAKLAND, Calif., May 20, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- AltCar, the nation's leading forum for green car ride and drive and public education takes place at Oakland City Hall on Thursday May 28 from 10am – 6pm. Showcasing the area's largest selection of electric, hydrogen, natural gas, propane, biodiesel and hybrid vehicles in one location with accompanying rebate and infrastructure information. AltCar will offer free ride and drives from Honda, Nis
